languages.text: "Равор, этот талантливый пустотник — на тебе. За все проступки спрошу с тебя".

traits.locale_text: "Равор, передаю его под твою ответственность. За все проступки спрошу с тебя".

languages.text: "Ravor, this talented voidsman is your responsibility. Should he commit any misdeeds henceforth, you will have to answer for them."
languages.original_text: "Равор, этот талантливый пустотник — на тебе. За все проступки спрошу с тебя".

traits.locale_text: "Ravor, this talented voidsman is your responsibility. Should he commit any misdeeds henceforth, you will have to answer for them."
"Ravor, this talented voidsman is your responsibility. Should he commit any misdeeds henceforth, you will have to answer for them."
"Ravor, this talented voidsman is your responsibility. Should he commit any misdeeds henceforth, you will have to answer for them."
"Ravor, this talented voidsman is your responsibility. Should he commit any misdeeds henceforth, you will have to answer for them."
"Ravor, this talented voidsman is your responsibility. Should he commit any misdeeds henceforth, you will have to answer for them."

languages.text: 「ラヴォア、この有能なヴォイズマンの監督は君に任せる。今後、彼が過ちを犯せば、その責任は君が問われることになる」
languages.original_text: "Ravor, this talented voidsman is your responsibility. Should he commit any misdeeds henceforth, you will have to answer for them."

traits.locale_text: 「ラヴォア、この有能なヴォイズマンの監督は君に任せる。今後、彼が過ちを犯せば、その責任は君が問われることになる」

languages.text: "Bu yetenekli uçsuz erinden sen sorumlusun Ravor. Bundan böyle bir hata yapacak olursa hesabını sen vereceksin."
languages.original_text: "Ravor, this talented voidsman is your responsibility. Should he commit any misdeeds henceforth, you will have to answer for them."

traits.locale_text: "Bu yetenekli uçsuz eri senin sorumluluğunda Ravor. Bundan böyle bir hata yapacak olursa hesabını sen vereceksin."

languages.text: «Ravor, este dotado infante del vacío pasa a ser responsabilidad suya. Si comete cualquier delito desde ahora, será usted quien responda por sus acciones».
languages.original_text: "Ravor, this talented voidsman is your responsibility. Should he commit any misdeeds henceforth, you will have to answer for them."

traits.locale_text: «Ravor, este dotado infante del vacío pasa a ser responsabilidad suya. Si comete cualquier delito desde ahora, será usted quien responda por sus acciones».

languages.text: “这个有能耐的船员你得负责管好，雷沃。从今往后，一旦他出了什么问题，我唯你是问。”
languages.original_text: "Ravor, this talented voidsman is your responsibility. Should he commit any misdeeds henceforth, you will have to answer for them."

traits.locale_text: “这个有能耐的船员你得负责管好，雷沃。从今往后，一旦他出了什么问题，我唯你是问。”

languages.text: « Ravor, ce cosmomarin prometteur est sous votre responsabilité. S'il devait commettre la moindre erreur, vous en répondrez en son nom. »
languages.original_text: "Ravor, this talented voidsman is your responsibility. Should he commit any misdeeds henceforth, you will have to answer for them."

traits.locale_text: « Ravor, ce cosmomarin prometteur est sous votre responsabilité. S'il devait commettre la moindre erreur, vous en répondrez en son nom. »

languages.text: "Ravor, Ihr seid für diesen talentierten Raumfahrer verantwortlich. Sollte er sich etwas zuschulden kommen lassen, werdet Ihr für ihn bürgen."
languages.original_text: "Ravor, this talented voidsman is your responsibility. Should he commit any misdeeds henceforth, you will have to answer for them."

traits.locale_text: "Ravor, Ihr seid für diesen talentierten Raumfahrer verantwortlich. Sollte er sich etwas zuschulden kommen lassen, werdet Ihr für ihn bürgen."
